name: XXXPhobia
description:
Let's Dream.....👁 Trigger Warning: SpidersDescription

XXXPhobia is a game combined 2D and 3D elements, using a Montage-like and Surrealistic way to give the player a dream-like experience, based on the concepts of “All The Emotions Matter”, and "Use Your Fear, Embrace Your Fear, Reconcile with Your Fear". 

This game has 2 different endings, based on different choices the players made when they are facing the fears. 

How To Play

Normally, use WASD to Move, SPACE to Interatct.

First-Person View: WASD to Move, Mouse to Move your view.

Some of the levels: W to Jump.

Team: YangYuZhi👁

Designers: Baizhi, Mikan Yu, Muliphein

Artist: Baizhi

Programmers: Mikan Yu, Muliphein
